code: import{useHover as useHoverWeb}from'@react-aria/interactions';import{useEffect}from'react';import{attachEventHandlersOnRef}from'@react-native-aria/utils';export var useHover=function useHover(props,ref){var params=useHoverWeb(props);useEffect(function(){attachEventHandlersOnRef(params.hoverProps,ref);},[]);return params;};
